channel.title: Comments on: How to make a bootable USB stick on Mac

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
Not sure what happened but this approach does not work with VMWare vSphere Hypervisor ISO, I have to follow instructions over here to make a bootable USB stick:
http://blog.macrepairsouthlondon.com/hardware/networking/create-esxi-usb-installer-mac-os-x/
item.content:encoded:
Not sure what happened but this approach does not work with VMWare vSphere Hypervisor ISO, I have to follow instructions over here to make a bootable USB stick:

http://blog.macrepairsouthlondon.com/hardware/networking/create-esxi-usb-installer-mac-os-x/
